scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run docker:config
scripts.install:all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ..
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.docker:start: docker-compose down -v && docker-compose build && docker-compose up -d
scripts.docker:reset: docker-compose down -v && docker-compose up -d postgres && sleep 10 && docker-compose up -d
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:reset: npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.update:all: cd backend && npm update && cd ../frontend && npm update && cd ..
